summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Nigerian Tax Estimator app. All core functionalities working correctly with 100% backend API success and excellent frontend integration.
passed_tests: All 14 backend API endpoints (100% success rate)
Homepage loads with hero section and tool cards
PIT Calculator - calculation and save functionality
PAYE Calculator - salary calculation with proper deductions
Business Tax Calculator - CIT calculation with proper categorization
Education page loads with accordion sections
Dashboard access and saved calculations display
Navigation between all pages works correctly
All data-testid attributes properly implemented for testing
